full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Simultaneous Interpretation Services

## Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01015467
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 100021586-A
* **Publication Date:** December 1, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 7, 2022, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Amendment Date:** December 6, 2022

## Objective

The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide real-time virtual simultaneous interpretation services for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC). The contractor will provide interpretation services in English and/or French for virtual training sessions and events held in the Atlantic Region.

## Scope of Work

The contractor will provide interpretation services in accordance with the Official Languages Act. A minimum of 3 sessions per year is guaranteed. The contract is estimated to be for one year, with two additional one-year option periods.

## Tender Requirements

* The contractor must have experience in providing simultaneous interpretation services, with a focus on virtual training sessions and events.
* The contractor must have a demonstrated understanding of the Official Languages Act and its requirements.
* The contractor must have a proven track record of meeting deadlines and providing high-quality services.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), among other agreements.

## Regions of Opportunity

The contract will be executed in the Atlantic Region, specifically in the provinces of:

* Newfoundland and Labrador
* New Brunswick
* Nova Scotia
* Prince Edward Island

## Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this tender should be directed to:

* Eric Potvin, Contracting Authority, Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
* Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
* Address: 142 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 2K3
